mapper.select: select * from kg_news where id in (select id from (select id from kg_news where id < ${news.id} and typeid =${news.typeid} order by id desc limit ${size}) as t) union select * from kg_news where id in (select id from (select id from kg_news where id > ${news.id} and typeid =${news.typeid} order by id asc limit ${size}) as t)
